name: Extension MedicalDevice
title: MedicalDevice extension
description: Some Dutch Health and Care Information models (Dutch: Zorginformatiebouwsteen or Zib) need a reference to the MedicalDevice HCIM. This reference can not be mapped to all the Zib's respective FHIR resources. This extension provides a generic method to extend profiles with a reference to a MedicalDevice.
purpose: Need to extend some FHIR resources with a reference to the MedicalDevice HCIM.
